5030.verse: ثُمَّ|`Then|61|104|293$إِنَّكُمْ|indeed you,|97|184|514$أَيُّهَا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ|O those astray!|147|234|16570$ٱلْمُكَذِّبُونَ|the deniers,|110|153|16571$

5035.verse: هَـٰذَا|This|59|100|248$نُزُلُهُمْ|(is) their hospitality|150|231|16577$يَوْمَ|(on the) Day|105|186|1057$ٱلدِّينِ|(of) Judgment.|118|158|11$

5036.verse: نَحْنُ|We|62|93|103$خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ|[We] created you,|143|205|5846$فَلَوْلَا|so why (do) not|127|189|635$تُصَدِّقُونَ|you admit the truth?|157|188|16578$

5041.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|116|640$عَلِمْتُمُ|you know|83|100|641$ٱلنَّشْأَةَ|the creation|101|118|13603$ٱلْأُولَىٰ|the first,|81|98|11384$فَلَوْلَا|so why not|94|111|635$تَذَكَّرُونَ|you take heed?|122|131|6186$

5045.verse: إِنَّا|`Indeed, we|102|290|120$لَمُغْرَمُونَ|surely are laden with debt,|198|386|16589$

5048.verse: ءَأَنتُمْ|Is it you|75|99|1260$أَنزَلْتُمُوهُ|who send it down|137|185|16591$مِنَ|from|50|98|156$ٱلْمُزْنِ|the rain clouds,|123|171|16592$أَمْ|or|38|86|62$نَحْنُ|We|62|86|103$ٱلْمُنزِلُونَ|(are) the Ones to send?|180|180|16593$

5049.verse: لَوْ|If|41|53|905$نَشَآءُ|We willed,|87|112|5786$جَعَلْنَـٰهُ|We (could) make it|146|171|5440$أُجَاجًا|salty,|75|100|16594$فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ|then why are you not grateful?|227|239|16595$

5051.verse: ءَأَنتُمْ|Is it you|75|88|1260$أَنشَأْتُمْ|who produced|113|140|16597$شَجَرَتَهَآ|its tree|95|122|16598$أَمْ|or|38|65|62$نَحْنُ|We|62|89|103$ٱلْمُنشِــُٔونَ|(are) the Producers?|157|170|16599$

5052.verse: نَحْنُ|We|62|70|103$جَعَلْنَـٰهَا|have made it|106|123|12087$تَذْكِرَةً|a reminder|89|106|11337$وَمَتَـٰعًا|and a provision|120|137|10083$لِّلْمُقْوِينَ|for the wayfarers in the desert.|230|238|16600$

5030.verse: Then indeed you, O those astray [who are] deniers,

5031.verse: Will be eating from trees of zaqqum

5032.verse: And filling with it your bellies

5033.verse: And drinking on top of it from scalding water

5034.verse: And will drink as the drinking of thirsty camels.

5035.verse: That is their accommodation on the Day of Recompense.

5036.verse: We have created you, so why do you not believe?

5037.verse: Have you seen that which you emit?

5038.verse: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator?

5039.verse: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone

5040.verse: In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that [form] which you do not know.

5041.verse: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?

5042.verse: And have you seen that [seed] which you sow?

5043.verse: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower?

5044.verse: If We willed, We could make it [dry] debris, and you would remain in wonder,

5047.verse: And have you seen the water that you drink?

5048.verse: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds, or is it We who bring it down?

5049.verse: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful?

5050.verse: And have you seen the fire that you ignite?

5051.verse: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the producer?

5052.verse: We have made it a reminder and provision for the travelers,

5053.verse: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

5054.verse: Then I swear by the setting of the stars,

5055.verse: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - [most] great.
